Package com.aerospike.txnSupport

Class TransactionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aerospike.txnSupport.TransactionManager
  • public class TransactionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for rollback of expired transactions and release of expired locks

                        throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
